verses.verse: Run back and forth <WH7751> through the streets <WH2351> of Jerusalem <WH3389>, and see <WH7200> now <WH3045>, and know, and seek <WH1245> in the broad places <WH7339> there <WH4672>, if you can find a man <WH376>, if there be <WH3426> any that executes <WH6213> judgment <WH4941>, that seeks <WH1245> the truth <WH530>; and I will pardon it <WH5545>.
And though they say <WH559>, The Lord <WH3068> lives <WH2416>; surely they swear <WH7650> falsely <WH8267>.

O Lord <WH3068>, are not your eyes <WH5869> upon the truth <WH530>? you have stricken <WH5221> them <WH2342>, but they have not grieved; you have consumed <WH3615> them <WH3985>, but they have refused to receive <WH3947> correction <WH4148>: they have made their faces <WH6440> harder <WH2388> than a rock <WH5553>; they have refused <WH3985> to return <WH7725>.
Therefore I said <WH559>, Surely these are poor <WH1800>; they are foolish <WH2973>: for they know <WH3045> not the way <WH1870> of the Lord <WH3068>, nor the judgment <WH4941> of their God <WH430>.

I will go <WH3212> unto the great men <WH1419>, and will speak <WH1696> unto them <WH3045>; for they have known the way <WH1870> of the Lord <WH3068>, and the judgment <WH4941> of their God <WH430>: but these have altogether <WH3162> broken <WH7665> the yoke <WH5923>, and burst <WH5423> the bonds <WH4147>.

Therefore a lion <WH738> out of the forest <WH3293> shall kill <WH5221> them <WH2061>, and a wolf of the evenings <WH6160> shall plunder <WH7703> them <WH5246>, a leopard shall watch <WH8245> over their cities <WH5892>: every one that goes out <WH3318> there shall <WH2007> be torn in pieces <WH2963>: because their transgressions <WH6588> are many <WH7231>, and their backslidings <WH4878> are increased <WH6105>.

How <WH335> shall I pardon <WH5545> you for this <WH2063>? your sons <WH1121> have forsaken <WH5800> me <WH7650>, and sworn by them that are no <WH3808> gods <WH430>: when I had fed them to the full <WH7650>, they then committed adultery <WH5003>, and assembled themselves by troops <WH1413> in the harlots <WH2181>' houses <WH1004>.
They were as fed <WH2109> horses <WH5483> in the morning <WH7904>: every one <WH376> neighed <WH6670> after his neighbors <WH7453> wife <WH802>.
Shall I not visit <WH6485> for these things <WH5002>? says the Lord <WH3068>: and shall not my soul <WH5315> be avenged <WH5358> on such a nation as this <WH1471>?
Go you up <WH5927> upon her walls <WH8284>, and destroy <WH7843>; but make <WH6213> not a full end <WH3617>: take away <WH5493> her battlements <WH5189>; for they are not the Lord <WH3068>'s.
For the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> and the house <WH1004> of Judah <WH3063> have dealt very <WH898> treacherously <WH898> against me <WH5002>, says the Lord <WH3068>.
They have denied <WH3584> the Lord <WH3068>, and said <WH559>, It is not he <WH7451>; neither shall evil come <WH935> upon us <WH7200>; neither shall we see sword <WH2719> nor famine <WH7458>:
And the prophets <WH5030> shall become wind <WH7307>, and the word <WH1696> is not in them <WH6213>: thus shall it be done unto them.

Therefore thus says <WH559> the Lord <WH3068> God <WH430> of hosts <WH6635>, Because you speak <WH1696> this word <WH1697>, behold <WH5414>, I will make my words <WH1697> in your mouth <WH6310> fire <WH784>, and this people <WH5971> wood <WH6086>, and it shall devour them <WH398>.

Behold <WH935>, I will bring a nation <WH1471> upon you from far <WH4801>, O house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068>: it is a mighty <WH386> nation <WH1471>, it is a ancient <WH5769> nation <WH1471>, a nation <WH1471> whose language <WH3956> you know <WH3045> not <WH8085>, neither understand what they say <WH1696>.
Their quiver <WH827> is as a open <WH6605> tomb <WH6913>, they are all mighty men <WH1368>.

And they shall eat up <WH398> your harvest <WH7105>, and your bread <WH3899>, which your sons <WH1121> and your daughters <WH1323> should eat <WH398>: they shall eat up <WH398> your flocks <WH6629> and your herds <WH1241>: they shall eat up <WH398> your vines <WH1612> and your fig trees <WH8384>: they shall impoverish <WH7567> your fenced <WH4013> cities <WH5892>, where you <WH2007> trusted <WH982>, with the sword <WH2719>.
Nevertheless in those days <WH3117>, says <WH5002> the Lord <WH3068>, I will not make <WH6213> a full end with you <WH3617>.

And it shall come to pass <WH559>, when you shall say, Why <WH8478> does <WH6213> the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430> do all these things unto us <WH559>? then shall you answer them <WH5800>, Just as you have forsaken me <WH5647>, and served strange <WH5236> gods <WH430> in your land <WH776>, so shall you serve <WH5647> strangers <WH2114> in a land that is not yours <WH776>.
Declare <WH5046> this in the house <WH1004> of Jacob <WH3290>, and publish <WH8085> it in Judah <WH3063>, saying <WH559>,
Hear <WH8085> now this <WH5530>, O foolish people <WH5971>, and without understanding <WH3820>; which have eyes <WH5869>, and see <WH7200> not <WH241>; which have ears, and hear not <WH8085>:

Fear <WH3372> you not me <WH5002>? says the Lord <WH3068>: will you not tremble <WH2342> at my presence <WH6440>, which have placed <WH7760> the sand <WH2344> for the bound <WH1366> of the sea <WH3220> by a perpetual <WH5769> decree <WH2706>, that it cannot pass <WH5674> it <WH1530>: and though the waves there toss <WH1607> themselves <WH3201>, yet can they not prevail; though they roar <WH1993>, yet can they not pass over it <WH5674>?
But this people <WH5971> has a revolting <WH5637> and a rebellious <WH4784> heart <WH3820>; they have revolted <WH5493> and are gone <WH3212>.

Neither say <WH559> they in their heart <WH3824>, Let us now fear <WH3372> the Lord <WH3068> our God <WH430>, that gives <WH5414> rain <WH1653>, both the former <WH3138> and the latter <WH4456>, in his season <WH6256>: he reserves <WH8104> unto us the appointed <WH2708> weeks <WH7620> of the harvest <WH7105>.
Your iniquities <WH5771> have turned away <WH5186> these things <WH2403>, and your sins have withheld <WH4513> good things from you <WH2896>.

For among my people <WH5971> are found <WH4672> wicked <WH7563> men <WH7789>: they lay wait, as he that sets <WH7918> snares <WH3353>; they set <WH5324> a trap <WH4889>, they catch <WH3920> men <WH582>.
As a cage <WH3619> is full <WH4392> of birds <WH5775>, so are their houses <WH1004> full <WH4392> of deceit <WH4820>: therefore they are become great <WH1431>, and grown rich <WH6238>.

They are grown fat <WH8080>, they shine <WH6245>: Yes <WH5674>, they overpass the deeds <WH1697> of the wicked <WH7451>: they judge <WH1777> not the cause <WH1779>, the cause of the fatherless <WH3490>, yet they prosper <WH6743>; and the right <WH4941> of the needy <WH34> do they not judge <WH8199>.
Shall I not visit <WH6485> for these things <WH5002>? says the Lord <WH3068>: shall not my soul <WH5315> be avenged <WH5358> on such a nation as this <WH1471>?
A wonderful <WH8047> and horrible thing <WH8186> is committed <WH1961> in the land <WH776>;

The prophets <WH5030> prophesy <WH5012> falsely <WH8267>, and the priests <WH3548> carry rule <WH7287> by their means <WH3027>; and my people <WH5971> love <WH157> to have it so <WH6213>: and what will you do in the end there <WH319>?
